snippet.title: Johnny Depp Amber Heard & The Youtube Psychologist Trend -- Narcissist &  Borderline Talk
snippet.description:
Can you trust armchair psychologists on Youtube that analyze situations like that of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp? There are so many coaching and psych channels discussing Amber's alleged narcissistic personality disorder or borderline disorder. 

Are they reliable in talking about this?


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Free Media Kit + Sponsored Content Email Templates: 
https://free-youtube-media-kit-email-template.gr8.com/
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FREE Course: The Easiest Strategy for High Traffic and Full-time Income on Youtube in 3-5 months!: 
https://grow-100000.getresponsepages.com/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Message me on Instagram!

http://www.instagram.com/theamerikanka

--------------------------------------------------------


--------- About the video " Johnny Depp Amber Heard & The Rise of Youtube Psychologists -- Narcissist & Borderline Personality Disorders "  ---------


Welcome to a new series on my channel called The Art Of Youtuberness! In this episode, I explore the rise of the arm chair psychology channels using what many are talking about lately: Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's abuse allegations--the mutual allegations they have made of abuse. 

 News of Amber Heard & Johnny Depp abuse allegations reached an all-time high during his libel trial against The Sun which branded him as a "wifebeater," and for that reason, a lot of audio documents and testimony from witnesses have surface which alledge Amber Heard is the abuser, and that Amber abused Johnny Depp. 

And now, many psych channels have made videos about whether or not Amber Heard has narcissistic personality disorder (NPD) or borderline personality disorder (BPD). 

So I thought it would be interesting to explore the credibility of some of these channels discussing this and their biases. I see a lot of channels never acknowledge that Johnny Depp, who chose to marry Amber after years of abuse, clearly has some sort of codependency or anxious attachment style--Johnny Depp that is. **That is my assumption.** 

So as much as people are happy to dissect the psychology of Amber Heard and say Amber Heard is a crazy, splitting, borderline psycho with extreme borderline anger, jealousy envy, and fear of abandonment, which she is!, many channels also reveal their lack of objectivity and psychological professionalism in never acknowledging Johnny's codependent weaknesses to stay in an abusive relationship for so many years, which made me question how credible are some of these channels that look at relationships as one-sided, putting all the responsibility on one individual. It shows a lack of understanding of the nuances of intimate partnerships. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SY54DvpWdTw

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FwOciJdc9Ao

How To: Free Hotels as a Small Youtuber
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFzQdO01CmQ

About SMALL CHANNEL WINS:

This channel is VERY SPECIFIC to small youtuber channels and Youtube beginners for getting more views, subscribers, brand deals, sponsored content, making money ASAP, and more. So everything you will see on this channel is specific to things that WILL WORK for Small Youtube Channels and how to be a better youtuber while they are still in the small phase of their channel and how to have success during that phase.
